rules.prepare:
TCLv=tcl8.5
export CFLAGS="$CFLAGS -fno-unit-at-a-time" export TCL_PACKAGE_PATH="/usr/local/lib/tcltk /usr/local/share/tcltk /usr/lib/tcltk /usr/share/tcltk /usr/lib"
touch $XPACK_SOURCE_DIR/generic/tclStubInit.c
cd $XPACK_BUILD_DIR $XPACK_SOURCE_DIR/unix/configure \ --prefix=/usr \ --disable-nls \ --enable-shared \ --enable-threads \ --enable-dll-unloading \ --disable-rpath \ --mandir=/usr/share/man \ --enable-man-symlinks \ --enable-man-compression=gzip \ --includedir=/usr/include/$TCLv
touch $XPACK_SOURCE_DIR/generic/tclStubInit.c
rules.build:
TCLv=tcl8.5
export CFLAGS="$CFLAGS -fno-unit-at-a-time"
cd $XPACK_BUILD_DIR make -j$XPACK_PARALLEL_JOBS
ar cr lib${TCLv}.a *.o ar d lib${TCLv}.a tclAppInit.o ranlib lib${TCLv}.a
rules.install:
TCLv=tcl8.5
cd $XPACK_BUILD_DIR make \ MAN_INSTALL_DIR=$XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/share/man \ INSTALL_ROOT=$XPACK_INSTALL_DIR \ MANN_INSTALL_DIR=$XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/share/man/man3 \ TCL_MODULE_PATH="/usr/lib/tcltk /usr/share/tcltk" \ install
# copy static lib cp -a $XPACK_BUILD_DIR/libtcl*.a $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/lib/
# move scripts mv -v $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/lib/*.sh $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/lib/$TCLv/
# install private headers install -d $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/include/$TCLv/tcl-private/generic cp $XPACK_SOURCE_DIR/generic/*.h $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/include/$TCLv/tcl-private/generic install -d $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/include/$TCLv/tcl-private/unix cp $XPACK_SOURCE_DIR/unix/*.h $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/include/$TCLv/tcl-private/unix install -d $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/include/$TCLv/tcl-private/compat cp $XPACK_SOURCE_DIR/compat/*.h $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/include/$TCLv/tcl-private/compat install -d $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/include/$TCLv/tcl-private/libtommath cp $XPACK_SOURCE_DIR/libtommath/*.h $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/include/$TCLv/tcl-private/libtommath
# fix permissions find $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR -type f -name '*.so' -exec chmod 755 '{}' ';'
# aclocal overrides mkdir -p $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/share/aclocal/ cp $XPACK_SOURCE_DIR/unix/tcl.m4 $XPACK_INSTALL_DIR/usr/share/aclocal/${TCLv}.m4
